DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy and safety of the administration of cyclosporine and prednisolone acetate compared to placebo in the treatment of allergic conjunctivitis.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating the Efficacy of Administration of Cyclosporine (Low Dose and High Dose) and Prednisolone Acetate Compared to Its Components and Vehicle in Patients With Allergic Conjunctivitis
